name: Chamz! 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

The World is dominated by the so-called divinity Chamtos. Chamz, its lovely people, worship him by working and celebrate. But our some of them are fed up and won't be satisfied until everything is upside down!

Platform : Samsung Gear VR + Mobile
Engine : Unity 
Number of players : 2-4

Producer : Alex BOLLE
Game Design :  Quentin BLIN, Grégoire GERONDAL
Game Art : Yani BELDJAOUDENE, Adam BOUCHERBA, Harmonie DUQUESNE
Game Design & Programming : Valentin PITON, Alexandre SABOUNI
Game Programming : Nathalie EYCHENNE
Music & Sound Design : Vincent BUCHER, Grégoire LEVILLAIN
